post:
**I won't accept money for WHMCS integrations.**

What do I accept as "payments"? Some sort of trade, for example: integration in return for 1 month of hosting, ect. 
Why won't I accept money? I don't see a need in someone paying cash for something that is really really easy to do.

Previous work(as of 18/12/2012 - 10:06 PM):
@Jeffrey gridhostingsolutions.com billing panel:
![one](http://puu.sh/1CxGL)
![two](http://puu.sh/1Cyko)

PremiumVM billing panel (19/12/2012 - 4:32 PM - full integration):
![o](http://puu.sh/1CLPa)
![t](http://puu.sh/1CLPI)

What I need? CSS code, javascript code(if any), images.
Expected completion time: within 48 hours.
Last completion time(as of December 18th 2012): Under two hours.

If you want to have it integrated or need more info PM me, if you have any general questions/concerns/ect, post them here.
